name: Groove Dodge
description:
Groove Dodge is a rhythm-based bullet-hell game.

Move on the BEAT to avoid incoming projectiles and rack up points.

Get the highest score!

CONTROLS:

WASD or ARROW KEYS to move

Some info on this project:

This is a prototype developed while learning to use Unreal Engine. It has been developed over a time span of more or less 2 months.

I would love to hear your feedback in the comments.

And thanks for trying out the game!
